paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patients P01, P03, and P04 had the highest NSS and NIS-LL scores and were the most affected having concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Mildly affected with small nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: As it can be deduced from NSS and NIS-LL data, patients P02, P05, and P06 were mildly affected having only a small nerve fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patients P01, P03, and P04 had the highest NSS and NIS-LL scores and were the most affected having concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patients P01, P03, and P04 had the highest NSS and NIS-LL scores and were the most affected having concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Mildly affected with small nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: As it can be deduced from NSS and NIS-LL data, patients P02, P05, and P06 were mildly affected having only a small nerve fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Mildly affected with small nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: As it can be deduced from NSS and NIS-LL data, patients P02, P05, and P06 were mildly affected having only a small nerve fiber neuropathy.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families as all patients have the mutation.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and mutation confirmation.
variants.additional_notes: All patients had a confirmed mutation in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: All had a confirmed mutation in the TTR gene: Val30Met in 5 cases and Glu89Lys in one.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Concomitant small and large nerve fiber neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient with the GLu89Lys mutation (P04) also had a heart transplant, as published previously.

functional_data.summary: The Glu89Lys mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families as the patient has the mutation.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and mutation confirmation.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had undergone liver transplantation.
key_quotes: The patient with the GLu89Lys mutation (P04) also had a heart transplant, as published previously.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and table.
